verses.verse: Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> went on <S%H5375><s%> his journey <S%H7272><s%>, and came <S%H3212><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of the east <S%H6924><s%>.

And he looked <S%H7200><s%>, and <S%H875><s%>, behold, a well in the field <S%H7704><s%>, and <S%H7969><s%>, lo, three flocks <S%H5739><s%> of sheep <S%H6629><s%> lying <S%H7257><s%> there by it <S%H875><s%>; for out of that well they watered <S%H8248><s%> the flocks <S%H5739><s%>: and the stone <S%H68><s%> upon the well <S%H875><s%>'s mouth <S%H6310><s%> was great <S%H1419><s%>.

And thither were all the flocks <S%H5739><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%>: and they rolled <S%H1556><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> from the well <S%H875><s%>'s mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and watered <S%H8248><s%> the sheep <S%H6629><s%>, and put <S%H7725><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> upon the well <S%H875><s%>'s mouth <S%H6310><s%> in its place <S%H4725><s%>.
And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H251><s%>, My brethren, whence <S%H370><s%> are ye <S%H559><s%>? And they said, Of Haran are we <S%H2771><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H3045><s%>, Know ye Laban <S%H3837><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nahor <S%H5152><s%>? And they said <S%H559><s%>, We know him <S%H3045><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H7965><s%>, Is it well with him <S%H559><s%>? And they said, It is well <S%H7965><s%>: and <S%H7354><s%>, behold, Rachel his daughter <S%H1323><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%> with the sheep <S%H6629><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Lo <S%H2005><s%>, it is yet high <S%H1419><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, neither is it time <S%H6256><s%> that the cattle <S%H4735><s%> should be gathered together <S%H622><s%>: water <S%H8248><s%> ye the sheep <S%H6629><s%>, and go <S%H3212><s%> and feed them <S%H7462><s%>.

And they said <S%H559><s%>, We cannot <S%H3201><s%>, until all the flocks <S%H5739><s%> be gathered together <S%H622><s%>, and they roll <S%H1556><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> from the well <S%H875><s%>'s mouth <S%H6310><s%>; then we water <S%H8248><s%> the sheep <S%H6629><s%>.
While he was yet <S%H5750><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> with them <S%H7354><s%>, Rachel came <S%H935><s%> with her father <S%H1><s%>'s sheep <S%H6629><s%>; for she kept them <S%H7462><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H3290><s%>, when Jacob saw <S%H7200><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Laban <S%H3837><s%> his mother <S%H517><s%>'s brother <S%H251><s%>, and the sheep <S%H6629><s%> of Laban <S%H3837><s%> his mother <S%H517><s%>'s brother <S%H251><s%>, that Jacob <S%H3290><s%> went near <S%H5066><s%>, and rolled <S%H1556><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> from the well <S%H875><s%>'s mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and watered <S%H8248><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> of Laban <S%H3837><s%> his mother <S%H517><s%>'s brother <S%H251><s%>.
And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> kissed <S%H5401><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%>, and lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%>, and wept <S%H1058><s%>.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> that he was her father <S%H1><s%>'s brother <S%H251><s%>, and that he was Rebekah <S%H7259><s%>'s son <S%H1121><s%>: and she ran <S%H7323><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> her father <S%H1><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H3837><s%>, when Laban heard <S%H8085><s%> the tidings <S%H8088><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> his sister <S%H269><s%>'s son <S%H1121><s%>, that he ran <S%H7323><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> him <S%H2263><s%>, and embraced him <S%H5401><s%>, and kissed him <S%H935><s%>, and brought him to his house <S%H1004><s%>. And he told <S%H5608><s%> Laban <S%H3837><s%> all these things <S%H1697><s%>.

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him <S%H389><s%>, Surely thou art my bone <S%H6106><s%> and my flesh <S%H1320><s%>. And he abode <S%H3427><s%> with him the space <S%H3117><s%> of a month <S%H2320><s%>.

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, Because thou art my brother <S%H251><s%>, shouldest thou therefore serve <S%H5647><s%> me for nought <S%H2600><s%>? tell <S%H5046><s%> me <S%H4909><s%>, what shall thy wages be?

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> had two <S%H8147><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%>: the name <S%H8034><s%> of the elder <S%H1419><s%> was Leah <S%H3812><s%>, and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the younger <S%H6996><s%> was Rachel <S%H7354><s%>.
And Leah <S%H3812><s%>'s eyes <S%H5869><s%> were tender <S%H7390><s%>; but Rachel <S%H7354><s%> was beautiful <S%H3303><s%> and <S%H3303><s%> well-favored <S%H4758><s%>.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> loved <S%H157><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%>; and he said <S%H559><s%>, I will serve <S%H5647><s%> thee seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> for Rachel <S%H7354><s%> thy younger <S%H6996><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%>.

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, It is better <S%H2896><s%> that I give <S%H5414><s%> her to thee <S%H5414><s%>, than that I should give her to another <S%H312><s%> man <S%H376><s%>: abide with me <S%H3427><s%>.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> for Rachel <S%H7354><s%>; and they seemed <S%H5869><s%> unto him but a few <S%H259><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, for the love he had to her <S%H160><s%>.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Laban <S%H3837><s%>, Give <S%H3051><s%> me my wife <S%H802><s%>, for my days <S%H3117><s%> are fulfilled <S%H4390><s%>, that I may go in unto her <S%H935><s%>.
And Laban <S%H3837><s%> gathered together <S%H622><s%> all the men <S%H582><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%>, and made <S%H6213><s%> a feast <S%H4960><s%>.
And it came to pass in the evening <S%H6153><s%>, that he took <S%H3947><s%> Leah <S%H3812><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> her to him <S%H935><s%>; and he went in unto her.
And Laban <S%H3837><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> Zilpah <S%H2153><s%> his handmaid <S%H8198><s%> unto his daughter <S%H1323><s%> Leah <S%H3812><s%> for a handmaid <S%H8198><s%>.

And it came to pass in the morning <S%H1242><s%> that <S%H3812><s%>, behold, it was Leah: and he said <S%H559><s%> to Laban <S%H3837><s%>, What is this thou hast done <S%H6213><s%> unto me <S%H5647><s%>? did not I serve with thee for Rachel <S%H7354><s%>? wherefore then hast thou beguiled me <S%H7411><s%>?

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, It is not so done <S%H6213><s%> in our place <S%H4725><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> the younger <S%H6810><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the first-born <S%H1067><s%>.

Fulfil <S%H4390><s%> the week <S%H7620><s%> of this one <S%H2063><s%>, and we will give <S%H5414><s%> thee the other also for the service <S%H5656><s%> which thou shalt serve <S%H5647><s%> with me yet seven <S%H7651><s%> other <S%H312><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.
And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H4390><s%>, and fulfilled her week <S%H7620><s%>: and he gave <S%H5414><s%> him Rachel <S%H7354><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%>.
And Laban <S%H3837><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to Rachel <S%H7354><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> Bilhah <S%H1090><s%> his handmaid <S%H8198><s%> to be her handmaid <S%H8198><s%>.

And he went in <S%H935><s%> also unto Rachel <S%H7354><s%>, and he loved <S%H157><s%> also Rachel <S%H7354><s%> more than Leah <S%H3812><s%>, and served <S%H5647><s%> with him yet seven <S%H7651><s%> other <S%H312><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that Leah <S%H3812><s%> was hated <S%H8130><s%>, and he opened <S%H6605><s%> her womb <S%H7358><s%>: but Rachel <S%H7354><s%> was barren <S%H6135><s%>.

And Leah <S%H3812><s%> conceived <S%H2029><s%>, and bare <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>, and she called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Reuben <S%H7205><s%>: for <S%H3588><s%> she said <S%H559><s%>, Because <S%H3588><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath looked <S%H7200><s%> upon my affliction <S%H6040><s%>; for now <S%H3588><s%> my husband <S%H376><s%> will love me <S%H157><s%>.

And she conceived <S%H2029><s%> again <S%H3205><s%>, and bare a son <S%H1121><s%>: and said <S%H559><s%>, Because Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath heard <S%H8085><s%> that I am hated <S%H8130><s%>, he hath therefore given <S%H5414><s%> me this son also <S%H7121><s%>: and she called his name <S%H8034><s%> Simeon <S%H8095><s%>.

And she conceived again <S%H2029><s%>, and bare <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>; and said <S%H559><s%>, Now this time <S%H6471><s%> will my husband <S%H376><s%> be joined <S%H3867><s%> unto me <S%H3205><s%>, because I have borne him three <S%H7969><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>: therefore was his name <S%H8034><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Levi <S%H3878><s%>.

And she conceived <S%H2029><s%> again <S%H3205><s%>, and bare a son <S%H1121><s%>: and she said <S%H559><s%>, This <S%H6471><s%> time will I praise <S%H3034><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: therefore she called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%>; and she left <S%H5975><s%> off bearing <S%H3205><s%>.
